UserDashboard.optinQuestion: Would you like personalized tips for interesting locations?
UserDashboard.collapseLink-title: Click to see events on this location
UserDashboard.event-template-title: Click to visit the page of this event
UserDashboard.NoRecommendations: You have no tips at this moment. Please check back later. If you are following our Twitter account we will also send you these tips via DM.
LandingPage.intro: Hello! Thanks for paying attention to our tweets. You are about to log-in into tips.fuorisalone.it, your personal Fuorisalone advisor. Let us help you, exploring Fuorisalone locations and events.
Enter your personal code received via Twitter DM or log in using Twitter
LandingPage.User_unknown_error: Sorry, we have not observed any geo-referenced tweets from you about fuorisalone locations and events, yet. Please, tweet about them letting your twitter client to access your position. We will soon invite you. Please, see hereafter what invited users can experience.
